REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F f0284 reute u f BC-<HOECHST-AG>-COMPLETE 03-02 0045

TEXT.TITLE: <HOECHST AG> COMPLETES CELANESE <CZ> ACQUISITION
TEXT.BODY: Hoechst AG of West Germany said it has completed the acquisition of Celanese Corp. Hoechst acquired a majority of Celanese shares in a recent tender offer at 245 dlrs per common share. Reuter
